drug products (or categories, dosage forms,

				adverse effect on safety or effectiveness of such drug product, including
				extended release products, metered dose inhalers, transdermal patches, and
				liposomal products; and

drug products (or categories, dosage forms,
				or ingredients thereof) that have been withdrawn or removed from the market
				because they have been found to be unsafe or not effective.
